dublin_core.dcvalue: In the United States human immunodeficiency virus acquired immunodeficiency syndrome HIV AIDS continues to have a heavy impact on men who have sex with men MSM Among MSM black men under the age of 30 are at the most risk for being diagnosed with HIV The US National HIV AIDS strategy recommends intensifying efforts in communities that are most heavily impacted to do so requires new methods for identifying and targeting prevention resources to young MSM especially young MSM of color
Using a geolocation social networking application to calculate the population density of sex-seeking gay men for research and prevention services.
